Summary: It was a circular shape that seemed to be on fire.
divs: sighting detailsmyself along with 5 friends were out on their deck enjoying the evening when one of us noticed this very bright and firey round\oval shape the was traveling across the northern sky. it had no blinking lights and no sound at all. it was a bright orangey red like it was on fire. it seemed to move up into the atmoshere until it slowly disappeared. there were no clouds that night for it to go behind either. one of my friends dismissed it as a chinese lantern, but personally i feel it was too large to be this and i don't think they burn that brightly. i may be buying one and launching it just to see if it might just have been one of those. just not sure of what we saw!
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Des Moines
There were no other sightings in Des Moines on or around July 8th 2011
